TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRow/DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

summary.span: Provides information about a to accessibility client applications.

span.span: Provides information about a to accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体包括内置的辅助功能支持，使应用程序能够使用可访问性客户端应用程序。Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications. 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例包括屏幕放大器和查看器实用程序、 语音输入的实用工具、 屏幕键盘、 其他输入的设备，以及键盘增强功能实用程序。Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 类继承自类，以提供有关的信息辅助功能客户端应用程序。The class inherits from the class to provide information about a to accessibility client applications. 表示的可视部分的每个类— 如， ，并— 还包含继承的类以提供有关包含类信息和执行代表可访问性客户端应用程序的操作。Each class that represents a visual part of the —such as , , and —also contains a class that inherits from to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications. 有实例时想要提供其他信息，例如名称或描述控件，可访问性客户端应用程序。There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the control, to accessibility client applications. 有两种方法来提供这些额外信息。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要提供的现有控件的有限的辅助功能信息，请设置控件的和属性值，将报告给辅助功能客户端应用程序。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. > [!NOTE] > 应更改并属性值仅在极少数情况下，例如，如果您使看起来像列表。You should change the and property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a look like a list. 有时，可能需要更多的辅助功能信息或其他可访问性操作，将包括您的自定义或。Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom or . 若要自定义可访问性，可以编写您自己的类派生自或类并重写方法。To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the or classes and override the method. 例如，如果你正在编写实现唯一的自定义操作，例如在单元中特殊命中测试的自定义行标头单元格应创建继承的类类并重写方法。For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the class and override the method. 公开其数据结构使用值定义的数据的表层次结构。The exposes its data structure by using values to define the data table hierarchy. 公开到 Microsoft Active Accessibility 的数据表的详细信息，请参阅"公开数据的表通过 Microsoft Active Accessibility"上的 MSDN library 中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了该方法将返回每个`navdir`值。The following table describes the that the method will return for each `navdir` value. |参数值Parameter value|返回值Return value| |---------------------|------------------| | 或 or |辅助性对象的当前行之下。An accessible object for the below the current row.| | 或 or |辅助性对象当前行的上方。An accessible object for the above the current row.| ||第一个辅助性对象行中。An accessible object for the first in the row. 如果是第一个单元格是`true`。The is the first cell if is `true`.| ||辅助性对象的最后一个行中。An accessible object for the last in the row.| |所有其他值All other values|`null`。`null`.|

summary.span: Modifies the selection or moves the keyboard focus of the accessible object.

span.span: Modifies the selection or moves the keyboard focus of the accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述的操作的方法将为每个执行`flags`值。The following table describes the action that method will perform for each `flags` value. |参数值Parameter value|操作Action| |---------------------|------------| ||获取焦点。The takes focus.| ||行中获取焦点。The in the row takes focus.| ||添加到属性。The is added to the property.| ||已从属性。The is removed from the property.| 当指定值的列当前具有焦点等同于将在当前获得焦点的单元格。When you specify the value, the column of the that currently has focus is the same as the cell that will take focus in the current . 例如，如果第 10，单元格 3 行具有焦点，并且您指定行月 15 日，则第 15 行，单元格 3 将具有焦点。For example, if row 10, cell 3 has focus, and you specify for row 15, then row 15, cell 3 will have focus. 第一个单元格的行中将获得焦点，如果没有在具有焦点。The first cell in the row will take focus if no in the has focus.
